thread.title: Almost 90% employees willing to leave startup job for big company: Study
thread.title_full: Almost 90% employees willing to leave startup job for big company: Study

title: Almost 90% employees willing to leave startup job for big company: Study
text: The 'Job Switching @ Startup' survey had over 750 employees as respondents 88% said they would leave their startup job for an established company12% said they would not leave their startup job for an established company80% of female employees said 'yes'90% of male employees said 'no' Reasons for respondents to quit their startup jobs 5% were concerned about status, and said being part of a big organisation is considered prestigious43% said they would get more salary in a big company30% said they were unable to maintain a work-life balance14% cited job security as a concern8% said they did not see any career growth in the long run70% junior-level employees and 68% senior-level employees cited money as being a factor, and 53% middle-level employees were concerned about work-life balance
